title: what is this Storm Razor shit im seeing riot??????
body:

I did a little testing, and it _seems_ the percentages are additive instead of overlapping. With {{item:3031}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3006}} at lvl 18, he does 140 AD and 69 true, when conqueror procs, he does 132 and 148 respectively. This is on test dummies of course. That's 209 vs. 280, a 71 damage difference. So it seems conqueror is still a good keystone.

Compared to live, 207 flat, changed to 197 and 98 true, 295 total.

So essentially. New IE is better for yasuo if he takes a different keystone, otherwise its definitely a nerf. Maybe people will stop complaining, maybe it will be changed. It will be a long PBE cycle.
